name: MainScript (1,3)
V3.0.0
info:
# V3.0.0
 - Reorgination of allot of code
 - Changed name of variables in Settings node
 - Added Device types:
 - Binary Sensor
 - Sensor (List of stings to show)
 - Tag
 - Select (List of Strings to select)

# V2.3.0
 - Add settings to use part of Variable name      enable part match if name to be valid  
  UnitsContainsName true is the new default
 - Add support for Select device types See example in Settings node and Device install


# V2.2.3
 - Add possible to enable Set fanmode topic  
   See  Settings for SetTime  
 - OEE/%sysname%/%taskname%/%valname%/FanModeSet   
 - converts to "off":0,
        "auto":1,
        "heat":2,
        "cool":3,
        "dry":4,
        "fan_only":5  
    Sent to EE/%sysname%/%taskname%/%valname%/_FanModeSet

# V2.2.2
 - Change presure to hPa
  you need to clear list and save list to update your already created devices 
 - Added som comments in function node that the settings that is used is in Settings node
 - Documentation updated to show it.
 
# V2.2.1
 - Added support for changing default unit text
 - Settings inject node updated with new info.
 - Default settings for new device so new units get "." as sufix/unit if not found in units list in settings inject node.
 

# V2.2.0
 - Add Send notification if Device is setup wrong and don't Create a device. 
 - example unsupported char is used in topic
 - (not A-Z,_,0-9)

# V2.1.2
 - Better Debug output added
 - More correct name of Flow settings
   you can select what to Input to allow
   All, none or a Singel topic

# V2.1.1
 - Small bugfix for bug that did that is skipped variable State  
 - Add as New device type for set time with Slider 0-240

# V2.1    
 - Added Termostat 
 - Fixed load list function
        
# V2.0 Rewrite of original node

https://github.com/KnatteAnka/NodeRED_ESPEASY_AutoDiscovery

name: TransformData (2)
Settings
info: Select node below to show settings

name: Selects example
